plays.text: Penalty to Nicklas Backstrom 2  minutes for High-sticking

Even Strength Goal Scored by Andre Burakovsky assisted by Evgeny Kuznetsov
Penalty to Alex Ovechkin 2  minutes for High-sticking
Penalty to Craig Smith 2  minutes for Holding the stick
Penalty to Mike Ribeiro 10  minutes for Instigator - Misconduct
Penalty to Ryan Johansen 2  minutes for Roughing
Penalty to Shea Weber 2  minutes for Delaying Game-Puck over glass
